txt.en: Destroy the source of the Dheghûn
At the end of the cavern, a large organic bulb pulses
'I saw with my eyes, all you have done. You are very very good, [placeholder]. Let us return to  Drû Bhûta and speak to Ghân-buri-Ghân of the good story we share.'
Your tampering has only released an unknown horror upon Gondor!
The shadowy beast's power fades as it sinks back to whence it came!
Destroy the source of the Dheghûn.
Rhûd-pulo-Drât is in need of a warrior to brave the depths of Nardol's ancient mine and destroy the source of the Dheghûn beneath the mountain.
Destroy the source of the Dheghûn.
Find the source of the Dheghûn
'To destroy darkness, must wear shadow. You have seen maw of darkness and live to tell story. We leave now?'
Defeat the Dheghûn and find out where they are coming from within the Nardol mines.
